thread.title: Numan to be honored at Q Awards
thread.title_full: Numan to be honored at Q Awards

title: Numan to be honored at Q Awards
text:
Share Updated: 9:33 am 
British pop veteran Gary Numan is to be honored for his contribution to music at the upcoming Q Awards. 
He will receive the "Innovation In Sound" trophy at the London prizegiving later this month. 
"Sound is the most important aspect of making music to me, it's why electronic music has been such an obsession," Gary says. "It allows you the opportunity to constantly create new and exciting sounds. I'm very grateful to Q for the award, and very proud. 
"To receive any award in music is an honor. But to receive the Q Innovation In Sound award is particularly special." 
Gary, 57, follows in the footsteps of previous winners including Muse, The Prodigy, Sonic Youth and Massive Attack, as well as last year's winner, Jean Michel Jarre. 
The Q Awards will be handed out on Oct. 19, and nominees include Ed Sheeran, Noel Gallagher, Florence + The Machine, Sam Smith, Kanye West, and Taylor Swift. Copyright WENN.com
